com.xtremelabs.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowToast

java.lang.Object
  com.xtremelabs.robolectric.shadows.ShadowToast

@Implements(value=android.widget.Toast.class)
public class ShadowToast
extends java.lang.Object

Shadow of Toast that tracks Toast requests. Hear hear! (*clink*)
